physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Right trapezius was flaccid; no palpable contractions. Obvious lateral scapular winging and prominence of the superior border of scapula. Active forward flexion of right shoulder was 70째; active abduction was 45째, both notably painful. Passive shoulder flexion was 130째; passive abduction was 110째. Positive drop-arm sign, subacromial crepitance, and moderate pain with impingement maneuvers. Mild pain and glenohumeral crepitance noted with shoulder external rotation. No subscapularis weakness, shoulder instability, or other neurological impairment.
